Talk_0064:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, hey, hey!


Tali is a special vai—the best of the best.
A voe can't just walk up to her and
start chatting!
Talk_0065:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL_00>HEY! What did I tell you?!


Don't try to act innocent! You know you're
not supposed to chitchat with her.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Ugh, this right here is everything that's
wrong with voe.
Talk_0066:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_01>What's this?! Tali wouldn't give you the
time of day, so you thought you'd just
start blabbin' at me?
Well, you listen here. We trekked aaall the
way here from the Gerudo region, which is
far to the southwest, for your information.
And we did this aaall because someone
said we could drive a vehicle the likes of
which no one has ever seen. What a joke!
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Anyway, you might say I'm real
disappointed. And you can definitely
say I'm in a real bad mood.
So, since there's no control thingy around
here, how about you make yourself useful,
and go <clr:0000>somewhere else<clr:ffff> and find one!
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Think_01>Oh, and another thing... I'm sick and
tired of all the Zo-this and Zo-that.
So no Zo-ANYTHING out of you, got it?
Talk_0067:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Try it on that vehicle prototype there so
we can see how it works.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Let's see... <sp:5:0:0>Hmm, I think...I flip the
switches here and here, and...<sp:5:1:0> Yes!
Talk_0050:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hmm. You found nothing among these
<clr:0000>Zonai devices <clr:ffff>capable of controlling
your vehicles?
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Ta-da! <sp:5:1:0>It's a test-drive course, you see!<sp:5:0:0>


Those pillars of light...they <clr:0000>disappear<clr:ffff>
when you <clr:0000>touch<clr:ffff> them. So here's what
I'd like you to do...
Touch <clr:0000>all the lights<clr:ffff> and return to where
you started within the time limit. Do that,
and we'll call the test drive a success.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Until now, we've never been able to
steer the thing properly. But if this
device works...
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>we'll have built another new vehicle—
and one that's completely different from
the balloon!
<sp:3:0:2:0401>Oh, I almost forgot... During the test
drive, <clr:0000>don't let go of the steering device<clr:ffff>
or <clr:0000>go too far off course<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We won't be able to retrieve the driving
data if you do that.
Talk_0051:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Hey, I told you! <sp:5:0:0>A lowly voe's got no
business blabbin' at me!

Ugh! We hauled ourselves all the way here
for some never-before-seen vehicle, and
it turns out to be a useless hunk o' junk!
But since no one can find a control thingy
for it around here, how about you make
yourself useful and look <clr:0000>somewhere else<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseM_01>Bah! Wasting all your time yip-yapping...
You'd never make it in the desert.
Talk_0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>That's the Zonai device you showed me
before, right?

I'm afraid it won't do us much good
as it is.

I wish we could put it to use...
Talk_0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>You had such an impressive machine to
work with. Ugh...<sp:5:1:0>what a shame.
Talk_0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:5:0:0><snd:TalkPositive_00>Victory comes to those who refuse
to give up.
Talk_0057:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>It is not wise to drive the course during
a lightning storm.<sp:5:0:0> A smart strategy would
be to wait for the weather to improve.
Talk_0058:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:CallFar_01>All right, stop there! Unfortunately,
time's up.
Talk_0059:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>I don't get it... That weird thing is gonna
make that huge contraption move?

<sp:3:0:2:0901>Say all the fancy words and silly jargon
you like, but I'll believe it when I see it
with my own two eyes!
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseS_01>This is no time for goofing off! Drive it like
you mean it!
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>You can see the lights clearly at night,
but...<sp:5:0:0>be wary of unforeseen obstacles.
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_00>The conditions aren't bad...<sp:5:0:0>how you fare
will simply depend on your skills.
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>The vehicle prototype is ready to go. All
we need to do now is attach some kind of
mechanism to steer it.
Unfortunately, none of the Zonai devices
<clr:0000>found in Tarrey Town <clr:ffff>right now do
the trick.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>um...<sp:5:1:0> You're not with Hudson
Construction...<sp:5:1:0>are you?
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, hey, hey! I'm standing right here.
Don't cut me out of this little chitchat.

Didn't you say those Zo-thingamabobs
are from the age of legends?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You trying to tell me something THAT old
and run-down is still useful? Please.
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>We did come all the way here. It couldn't
hurt to put our heads together.

Besides, it's important for a racer to
know her ride as well as she knows
her own hands.
Wasn't it you who taught me
that, Shabonne?
Talk_0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hmph!<sp:5:1:0> Fine. If Tali wants to help, then
help is what we'll do.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thank goodness!<sp:5:1:0> I'm so glad you came
back. I don't know what we'd have done
if you didn't.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Well, everything has been prepped
and made ready so we could start the
moment you arrived.
Talk_0091:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:WorkHeavy_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Hey now!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>That vehicle is a prototype. Please, do not
touch...<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0> Hold on...
Talk_0092: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Oh, also, you're welcome to have this...
Talk_0093:
<snd:TalkPositive_01>Head straight down that road. You can't
miss it.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Eh, if you would, please attach that
<clr:0000>Zonai device <clr:ffff>of yours to the vehicle
prototype.
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Greeting_01>What's this?! You thought a lowly voe
could just chitchat with the likes of me?

Well, listen up. We trekked aaall the way
here from the Gerudo region, which is far
off to the southwest, for your information.
And we did this aaall because someone
said we could drive a vehicle the likes of
which no one had ever seen. What a joke!
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Anyway, you might say I'm real
disappointed. And you can definitely
say I'm in a real bad mood.
So, since there's no control thingy around
here, how about you make yourself useful,
and go <clr:0000>somewhere else<clr:ffff> and find one!
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Think_01>Oh, and another thing... I'm sick and
tired of all the Zo-this and Zo-that.
So no Zo-ANYTHING out of you, got it?
Talk_0094:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>You must be exhausted from driving such
a strange machine. Go get some rest in a
comfy bed.
While you do that, I'll get to work on
<clr:0000>the next phase<clr:ffff> of our project. I hope
you're as excited about it as I am!
Talk_0095:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>You've got it all wrong. It's like
I said before...

I'm working with Hudson Construction
to make vehicles out of the Zonai devices
and other debris that fell from the sky.
And yes, it's true. <sp:5:0:0>We haven't figured out
how to control these vehicles...<sp:5:0:0>

But that's why we asked you here. We're
hoping professional racers like the two of
you can offer some guidance.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0096:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I guess if he's here...<sp:5:1:0>he must be involved somehow.<sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>The name's Fernison. I'm working with
Hudson on a Zonai-device research
project. It's a pleasure to meet you.
In fact, right now we're prototyping
new vehicles.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Unfortunately, we've run into a bit of a
problem. We haven't found a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>
capable of controlling the vehicles.
We tried all of the devices in Tarrey Town,
but none of them worked.

We even brought in a couple of top-notch
Gerudo racers to get their advice...<sp:5:1:0>but I'm
afraid that made things worse.
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>OH! <sp:5:1:0>What...is this?!<sp:5:1:0> I've never seen a
Zonai device like this before!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But I don't think I can do anything with
it...not like this anyway.

I wish there was a way we could use it...
Talk_0097:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>OH! <sp:5:1:0>What...is this?!<sp:5:1:0> I've never seen a
Zonai device like this before!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Ah! If we're going to do this, let's do
it right.

Hold on a minute while I get everything
ready for a test drive.
Talk_0098:
<clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0301><clr:ffff>Ah, sorry for shouting.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The name's Fernison. I'm working with
Hudson on a Zonai-device research
project. It's a pleasure to meet you.
<sp:3:0:2:0401>But more importantly, this Zonai device
of yours...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>It looks like it could...<sp:5:0:0>be used for
steering things, don't you think?!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_01>But if you don't mind,<sp:5:0:0> how does this
thing work?
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:LaughS>Finally! Things are getting interesting
around here. You better believe I'll be
keeping a close eye on your technique.
Talk_0099:
<clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0301><clr:ffff>Ah, so sorry for shouting.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Are you new to Hudson Construction?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>My name is Fernison. I'm collaborating
with Hudson on a Zonai-device research
project. It's a pleasure to meet you.
<sp:3:0:2:0401>But more importantly, this Zonai device
of yours...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>It seems like it could...<sp:5:0:0>be used for
steering things, doesn't it?!
Talk_0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>And here I thought you were a voe with
some real skills. So much for that.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>You had such an impressive machine to
work with too. What a waste.
Talk_0080:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Hehe! You're now an official member of
our team!
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:5:0:0><snd:TalkPositive_01>You are capable of doing better. I am
sure of it.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I don't believe it! I never thought
something so big could be steered
so easily!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_01>As long as we get to do some racing, you
won't hear any complaints from us.
Talk_0082:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>The <clr:0000>Tarrey Town Race<clr:ffff>... Hmm, yes, I am
looking forward to it.
Talk_0083:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Just a moment. Let me activate
the switches...
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>See! The vehicle is up and running!
So don't accuse me of trying to trick
you anymore!
My goal has always been to start work
on the <clr:0000>Tarrey Town Race project<clr:ffff>, and
finally I can do just that.
Now, it's time for me to start preparing
a test course.
Talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Close, close...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Don't forget to come back to the
<clr:0000>starting point <clr:ffff>to finish the test.
Talk_0084:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Chat_01>First this switch here, and then this one,
too, and...<sp:5:1:0> There!
Talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's a sleepover ticket for a stable.
The closest one to here is probably
South Akkala Stable.
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad_00>Looks like you've gone too far off
course. Rules are rules, so stop and
come back, please.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Then let's get started! Go ahead and
board the vehicle.
Talk_0085:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I'm so glad you're willing to try again!<sp:5:1:0>
I don't know what we'd do without you.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Everything is prepped and ready to go.
Ready to take the prototype for a spin?
Talk_0102:
You're not allowed to take that! That's
a valuable part of our prototype!
Talk_0103:
Yes, yes, now I see how it could be used
to steer something.

Could you come here for a minute?
I have a favor to ask.
Talk_0086:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Are you ready? Well then, let's go! Show
us what that <clr:0000>Zonai device <clr:ffff>can do!
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Everything is ready! Now, if you don't
mind, I'd like you to give it a try.
Talk_0104:
That vehicle is a prototype! So please,
no touching!
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CallFar_00>Now let me quickly remind you of
the rules!

It's simple really. Just touch <clr:0000>all of the
lights<clr:ffff> and return to the starting point
within the time limit.
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh, and <clr:0000>don't let go of the steering device<clr:ffff>
or <clr:0000>go too far off the course<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We can't get the driving data we need
if you do that.
Talk_0106:
In fact, I got everything prepped and
ready to go so we could start the
moment you returned.
So, if you don't mind, I'd like to have
you take the vehicle prototype for a
test drive.
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Sad_00>Uh-oh... <sp:5:1:0>Looks like you've let go of the
steering device. Rules are rules, so stop
and come back, please.
Talk_0070:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Incredible! Just...just look at it!
It's perfect!

I have no doubt that Zonai device was
made for steering!
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmm, as things stand, I cannot say you
passed.

But I do feel confident that Zonai device
will work.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Sadly, no. None of the <clr:0000>devices <clr:ffff>we've
found here in <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> work.
Talk_0071:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>You see those pillars of light?<sp:5:0:0> They
disappear when you touch them.

All you have to do is touch <clr:0000>all of the lights<clr:ffff>
and return to the starting point within the
time limit.
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh...and be sure you <clr:0000>don't let go of the
steering device<clr:ffff> or <clr:0000>go too far off course<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>We won't be able to get the data we need
if you do that.
Talk_0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I wonder if different <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>—
ones we've never seen—have fallen in
other regions?
0002: I want to take a break.
Talk_0074:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Ah, <sp:5:0:0>no...<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry...I just didn't think
you'd say "maybe later" after all that.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>We don't know how this Zonai device of
yours works. So...I really hope you come
back and try the course sometime...soon.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive_00>Please, could you show us what, exactly,
this device is capable of?
Talk_0076:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Hooo! Technique like that is enough to
get anyone fired up!
Talk_0077:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>No one who loves racing could watch that
and not feel excited.
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>That's too bad...but if that's what you
want, I'll shut everything down.
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Hey! Fernison! <sp:5:1:0>We're not done talkin' yet!<sp:5:1:0>


We left the desert and trekked all the way
here because you said there was a vehicle
the likes of which no one's seen before.
Then we get here and it's nothin' but a
<clr:0000>piece of junk that no one can control<clr:ffff>?!

<sp:3:0:2:0901>So I gotta ask, what kind of fools do you
take us for?!
Talk_0078:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>We can finally move on to the next
phase! See, this is just the beginning
of my experiments.
I must figure out this Zonai device's
full capabilities.

And...<sp:5:1:0>ah...<sp:5:1:0>I'm counting on you to help
me out.

Here. Please consider this a
down payment.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Just touch <clr:0000>all of the lights<clr:ffff> and return to
the starting point within the time limit.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>But remember... <sp:5:1:0>You'll have to start over
if you <clr:0000>let go of the device <clr:ffff>or<clr:0000> get too far
off course<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0201>With that machine there, I'm sure you'll
do just fine. Don't get discouraged. You
can do it!
0009: I want to talk to you...
Talk_0060: <sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:5:0:0><snd:Greeting_00>No more delays. <sp:5:1:0>I must see how it works.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>The rain interferes with visibility.<sp:5:0:0> It seems
a wise strategy to wait for better weather.
Talk_0061: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Aha, so that's how you set it up!
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Zo-whatsit?! What are you even
talking about?

We're racers, not scholars, OK?


<sp:3:0:2:0901>Don't try to confuse us with your
fancy words.
Talk_0062:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>um... <sp:5:1:0>Good evening.<sp:5:1:0> You're not with
Hudson Construction...<sp:5:1:0>are you?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Fernison!<sp:5:1:0> This isn't what we agreed to!


We left the desert and trekked all the way
here because you said we'd get to drive a
vehicle like no one's ever seen before.
And now that we're here, the only vehicle
you've got is some <clr:0000>piece o' junk that
no one can control<clr:ffff>?!
<sp:3:0:2:0901>What kinda fools do you take us for?!
Talk_0063:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>um...<sp:5:1:0> Good afternoon.<sp:5:1:0> You're not
with Hudson Construction...<sp:5:1:0>are you?
